ntp_show_less.title: Show Less
ntp_show_less.note: Button that reduces the number of items or content displayed.

ntp_show_more.title: Show More
ntp_show_more.note: Button that increases the number of items or content displayed.

ntp_dismiss.title: Dismiss
ntp_dismiss.note: Button that closes or hides the current popup or notification.

ntp_customizer_button.title: Customize
ntp_customizer_button.note: Button opens a menu. The menu allows the user to customize the page, such as showing/hiding sections.

widgets_visibility_menu_title.title: Customize New Tab Page
widgets_visibility_menu_title.note: Heading text describing that there's a list of toggles for customizing the page layout.

updateNotification_updated_version.title: Browser Updated to version {version}.
updateNotification_updated_version.note: Text to indicate which new version was updated. `{version}` will be formatted like `1.22.0`

updateNotification_whats_new.title: See what's new in this release.
updateNotification_whats_new.note: The `<a>` tag represents a clickable link, please preserve it.

updateNotification_dismiss_btn.title: Dismiss
updateNotification_dismiss_btn.note: Button label text for an action that removes the widget from the screen.

protections_menuTitle.title: Protections Report
protections_menuTitle.note: Used as a label in the main navigation menu. 'Protections' refers to the privacy features that block trackers.

protections_statsSwitchTitle.title: Summary
protections_statsSwitchTitle.note: Used as a label in a toggle switch that shows aggregated privacy statistics. This is one of two options in a view selector (the other is 'Details').

protections_activitySwitchTitle.title: Details
protections_activitySwitchTitle.note: Used as a label in a toggle switch that shows recent browsing activity with tracking information. This is one of two options in a view selector (the other is 'Summary').

protections_noRecent.title: No recent tracking activity
protections_noRecent.note: Placeholder text shown in the Details view when no tracking activity was blocked in the last 7 days. Keep concise if possible.

stats_menuTitle.title: Blocked Tracking Attempts
stats_menuTitle.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

stats_menuTitle_v2.title: Protection Stats
stats_menuTitle_v2.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

stats_noActivity.title: DuckDuckGo blocks tracking attempts as you browse. Visit a few sites to see how many we block!
stats_noActivity.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked trackers yet

stats_noRecent.title: Tracking protections active
stats_noRecent.note: Placeholder to indicate that no tracking activity was blocked in the last 7 days

stats_countBlockedSingular.title: 1 tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedSingular.note: The main headline indicating that a single tracker was blocked

stats_countBlockedPlural.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

stats_noActivityAdsAndTrackers.title: DuckDuckGo blocks ads and tracking attempts as you browse. Visit a few sites to see how many we block!
stats_noActivityAdsAndTrackers.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked ads and trackers yet

stats_noRecentAdsAndTrackers.title: Protections active
stats_noRecentAdsAndTrackers.note: Placeholder to indicate that no ads or tracking activity was blocked in the last 7 days

stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersSingular.title: 1 advertising & tracking attempt blocked
stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersSingular.note: The main headline indicating that a single ad or tracking attempt was blocked

stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPlural.title: {count} advertising & tracking attempts blocked
stats_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 ad or tracking attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 advertising & tracking attempts blocked

stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.title: 1 attempt blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 7 days
stats_feedCountBlockedSingular.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.title: Past 7 days
stats_feedCountBlockedPeriod.note: A summary description indicating the time period of the blocked tracking attempts, which is the past 7 days.

stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
stats_feedCountBlockedPlural.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts were blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 7 days when there is more than one. E.g., '1,028 tracking attempts blocked.

stats_toggleLabel.title: Show recent activity
stats_toggleLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that shows the detailed activity feed

stats_hideLabel.title: Hide recent activity
stats_hideLabel.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that hides the detailed activity feed

stats_otherCompanyName.title: Other
stats_otherCompanyName.note: A placeholder to represent an aggregated count of entries, not present in the rest of the list. For example, 'Other: 200', which would mean 200 entries excluding the ones already shown

stats_otherCount.title: {count} attempts from other networks
stats_otherCount.note: An aggregated count of blocked entries not present in the main list. For example, '200 attempts from other networks'

omnibar_menuTitle.title: Search
omnibar_menuTitle.description: Title of the omnibar widget in the customizer panel.

omnibar_aiChatFormPlaceholder.title: Ask privately
omnibar_aiChatFormPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the AI chat input field.

omnibar_aiChatFormSubmitButtonLabel.title: Send
omnibar_aiChatFormSubmitButtonLabel.description: Accesible label for the AI chat submit button.

omnibar_logoAlt.title: DuckDuckGo
omnibar_logoAlt.description: Alt text for the DuckDuckGo logo.

omnibar_tabSwitcherLabel.title: Search & Duck.ai tab switcher
omnibar_tabSwitcherLabel.description: Accessible label for the tab switcher between search and AI modes.

omnibar_aiTabLabel.title: Duck.ai
omnibar_aiTabLabel.description: Label for the AI chat tab.

omnibar_searchFormPlaceholder.title: Search privately
omnibar_searchFormPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input field.

omnibar_searchFormCloseButtonLabel.title: Close
omnibar_searchFormCloseButtonLabel.description: Accessible label for the close button in the search form.

omnibar_toggleDuckAi.title: Duck.ai
omnibar_toggleDuckAi.description: Label for the button to toggle the Duck.ai chat interface.

omnibar_searchDuckDuckGoSuffix.title: Search DuckDuckGo
omnibar_searchDuckDuckGoSuffix.description: Text placed after suggestions that will search DuckDuckGo.

omnibar_duckDuckGoSuffix.title: DuckDuckGo
omnibar_duckDuckGoSuffix.description: Text placed after suggestions that will open a DuckDuckGo page.

omnibar_visitSuffix.title: Visit {url}
omnibar_visitSuffix.description: Text placed after suggestions that will open a webpage.

nextSteps_sectionTitle.title: Next Steps
nextSteps_sectionTitle.note: Text that goes in the Next Steps bubble above the first card

nextSteps_bringStuff_title.title: Bring Your Stuff
nextSteps_bringStuff_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for importing bookmarks and favorites

nextSteps_bringStuff_summary.title: Import bookmarks, favorites, and passwords for a smooth transition from your old browser.
nextSteps_bringStuff_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for importing bookmarks and favorites

nextSteps_bringStuff_actionText.title: Import Now
nextSteps_bringStuff_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for importing bookmarks and favorites

nextSteps_defaultApp_title.title: Set as Default Browser
nextSteps_defaultApp_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for making DDG the user's default browser

nextSteps_defaultApp_summary.title: We automatically block trackers as you browse. It’s privacy, simplified.
nextSteps_defaultApp_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for making DDG the user's default browser

nextSteps_defaultApp_actionText.title: Make Default Browser
nextSteps_defaultApp_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for making DDG the user's default browser

nextSteps_blockCookies_title.title: Block Cookie Pop-ups
nextSteps_blockCookies_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for blocking cookie pop-ups

nextSteps_blockCookies_summary.title: We need your permission to say no to cookies on your behalf. Easy choice.
nextSteps_blockCookies_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for blocking cookie pop-ups

nextSteps_blockCookies_actionText.title: Block Cookie Pop-ups
nextSteps_blockCookies_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for blocking cookie pop-ups

nextSteps_emailProtection_title.title: Protect Your Inbox
nextSteps_emailProtection_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for email protection

nextSteps_emailProtection_summary.title: Generate @duck.com addresses that remove trackers from email and forwards to your inbox.
nextSteps_emailProtection_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for email protection

nextSteps_emailProtection_actionText.title: Get Email Protection
nextSteps_emailProtection_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for email protection

nextSteps_duckPlayer_title.title: YouTube Without Creepy Ads
nextSteps_duckPlayer_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for adopting DuckPlayer

nextSteps_duckPlayer_summary.title: Enjoy a clean viewing experience without personalized ads.
nextSteps_duckPlayer_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for adopting DuckPlayer

nextSteps_duckPlayer_actionText.title: Try DuckPlayer
nextSteps_duckPlayer_actionText.note: Button text of the Next Steps card for adopting DuckPlayer

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_title.title: Add App to the Dock
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_summary.title: Access DuckDuckGo faster by adding it to the Dock.
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_actionText.title: Add to Dock
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_actionText.note: Initial button text of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_addAppDockMac_confirmationText.title: Added to Dock!
nextSteps_addAppDockMac_confirmationText.note: Button text after clicking on the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_title.title: Pin App to the Taskbar
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_title.note: Title of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_summary.title: Access DuckDuckGo faster by pinning it to the Taskbar.
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_summary.note: Summary of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_actionT.title: Pin to Taskbar
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_actionT.note: Initial button text of the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_confirm.title: Pinned to Taskbar!
nextSteps_pinAppToTaskbarWindows_confirm.note: Button text after clicking on the Next Steps card for adding DDG app to OS dock

favorites_show_less.title: Show less
favorites_show_less.note: Button label to display fewer items

favorites_show_more.title: Show more ({count} remaining)
favorites_show_more.note: Button text to show hidden items. {count} will be replaced with the number of remaining favorite items to show, including the parentheses. Example: 'Show more (18 remaining)'

favorites_menu_title.title: Favorites
favorites_menu_title.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

favorites_add.title: Add Favorite
favorites_add.note: A button that allows a user to add a new 'favorite' bookmark to their existing list

customizer_image_privacy.title: Images are stored on your device so DuckDuckGo can’t see or access them.
customizer_image_privacy.note: Shown near a button that allows a user to upload an image to be used as a background.

customizer_drawer_title.title: Customize
customizer_drawer_title.note: Title in a slide-out drawer that contains options for customizing the browser.

customizer_section_title_background.title: Background
customizer_section_title_background.note: Section title displayed in the UI for customizing the background.

customizer_section_title_theme.title: Browser Theme
customizer_section_title_theme.note: Section title for a section where users can customize the browser theme. (for example, 'light' or 'dark')

customizer_section_title_sections.title: Sections
customizer_section_title_sections.note: Section title for a list of toggles for showing/hiding certain sections of the page.

customizer_browser_theme_light.title: Light
customizer_browser_theme_light.note: The label for a button that sets the browser theme to 'light' mode

customizer_browser_theme_dark.title: Dark
customizer_browser_theme_dark.note: The label for a button that sets the browser theme to 'dark' mode

customizer_browser_theme_system.title: System
customizer_browser_theme_system.note: The label for a button that sets the browser theme to 'system', which matches the operating system setting

customizer_browser_theme_label.title: Select {type} theme
customizer_browser_theme_label.note: The label text on a button, for assistive technologies (like screen readers). {type} will be replace with 'light', 'dark' or 'system'

customizer_settings_link.title: Go to Settings
customizer_settings_link.note: The label text on a link that opens the Settings

customizer_background_selection_default.title: Default
customizer_background_selection_default.note: Label text below a button that selects a 'default' background

customizer_background_selection_color.title: Solid Colors
customizer_background_selection_color.note: Label text below a button that allows a color background

customizer_background_selection_gradient.title: Gradients
customizer_background_selection_gradient.note: Label text below a button that allows a gradient background

customizer_background_selection_image_ad.title: Add Background
customizer_background_selection_image_ad.note: Label text shown on a button that allows an image to be uploaded

customizer_background_selection_image_ex.title: My Backgrounds
customizer_background_selection_image_ex.note: Label text shown on a button navigates to list of existing background (that the user previously uploaded)

customizer_image_select.title: Select image {number}
customizer_image_select.note: Label text on a button, for assistive technologies (like screen readers). {number} will be replaced with a numeric reference of 1-8, eg: 'Select image 1'

customizer_image_delete.title: Delete image {number}
customizer_image_delete.note: Label text on a button that deletes an image. {number} will be replaced with a numeric reference of 1-8, eg: 'Delete image 1'

activity_noRecent_title.title: No recent browsing activity
activity_noRecent_title.note: Placeholder to indicate that no browsing activity was seen in the last 7 days

activity_empty.title: Recently visited sites will appear here. Keep browsing to see how many trackers we block.
activity_empty.note: Shown in the place a list of browsing history entries will be displayed.

activity_no_trackers.title: No trackers found
activity_no_trackers.note: Placeholder message indicating that no trackers are detected

activity_no_trackers_blocked.title: No trackers blocked
activity_no_trackers_blocked.note: Placeholder message indicating that no trackers are blocked

activity_countBlockedPlural.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
activity_countBlockedPlural.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

activity_noRecentAdsAndTrackers_subtitle.title: Recently visited sites will appear here. Keep browsing to see how many ads and trackers we block.
activity_noRecentAdsAndTrackers_subtitle.note: Shown in the place a list of browsing history entries will be displayed.

activity_no_adsAndTrackers.title: No ads + tracking attempts found
activity_no_adsAndTrackers.note: Placeholder message indicating that no ads and trackers are detected

activity_no_adsAndTrackers_blocked.title: No ads + tracking attempts blocked
activity_no_adsAndTrackers_blocked.note: Placeholder message indicating that no ads and trackers are blocked

activity_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPlura.title: {count} ads + tracking attempts blocked
activity_countBlockedAdsAndTrackersPlura.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 ads + tracking attempts blocked'

activity_favoriteAdd.title: Add {domain} to favorites
activity_favoriteAdd.note: Button label, allows the user to add the specified domain to their favorites

activity_favoriteRemove.title: Remove {domain} from favorites
activity_favoriteRemove.note: Button label, allows the user to remove the specified domain from their favorites

activity_itemRemove.title: Remove {domain} from history
activity_itemRemove.note: Button label for clearing browsing history for a given domain.

activity_burn.title: Clear browsing history and data for {domain}
activity_burn.note: Button label for clearing browsing history and data exclusively for the specified domain

activity_menuTitle.title: Recent Activity
activity_menuTitle.note: Used as a label in a customization menu

activity_show_more_history.title: Show {count} more
activity_show_more_history.note: Button label that expands the list of browsing history with the specified count of additional items. Example: 'Show 5 more'

activity_show_less_history.title: Hide additional
activity_show_less_history.note: Button label that hides the expanded browsing history items.
